description:
Description

Fragments is a Single Player First-Person Survival Horror game with puzzles, set in a haunted mansion filled with monstrosities and riddles in every corner. 

Story

The story takes place in an old residence, grounded in an unknown dimension. You are Álvaro, a man who woke up in this mansion with no recollection of how or why he got there. Those wandering souls dwelling in this dimension are stranded in limbo, suffering never ending death and terror.  Álvaro must find a way out of this dimension by fighting shadows from his past and uncovering the truth that led him there in the first place.

Features

  • A riveting yet subtle story
  • Haunting atmosphere
  • Exciting action
  • Unique puzzles
